description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on January 26 2023 by 2 pm EST. All bids submitted after 2 pmEST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. In the course of its R&D projects, CanmetENERGY requires a flexible rapid prototyping inverter platform that will allow the researchers to test various operation strategies of inverters in various conditions. See Equipment Specifications \/ Characteristics.

full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Reference :

WS3248373968-Doc3251312066

#### Amendment Number :

3

#### Solicitation Number :

WS3248373968

#### Tender Status:

Expired

#### Request for Proposal (RFP):

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), hereby announces a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of Air-Mobile Containers.

#### Tender Description:

The Ministry of Energy is seeking proposals for a flexible rapid prototyping inverter platform that will enable researchers to test various operation strategies of inverters under different conditions. The tender description can be found on [Ariba Discovery](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/11752844?extsite=MTE3NTI4NDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) and Buyandsell.

#### Tender Closing Date and Time:

January 26, 2023, by 2:00 pm (EST). Any bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

#### Tender Details:

* Trade Agreements: This tender is open to any bidder who is a party to a trade agreement with Canada.
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: Saguenay
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Information:
	+ Pierre Guyonnet
	+ pierre.guyonnet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Notice URL:

The tender notice can be accessed via [Ariba Discovery](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/11752844?extsite=MTE3NTI4NDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) and Buyandsell.

Best regards, [Your Name]

Note: 
* I rewrote the tendon announcement to fit 400 words, it was quite a task as the contractor shared a huge chunk of data.
* Some information might have been left out to preserve the balance of the 400-word limit, please point out what is missing if you find some crucial data 
* I changed requestForProposal from a bunch of asterisks to **Request for Proposal** so it stands out nicely.
* Changed formatting style as the contractor's style looked outdated and not user-friendly, the markdown format follows the desired visual appeal.


Please check and point out anything you would like me to revise.  I am here to
